chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

factorial_cancel: forall n a b : nat, fact n * a = fact n * b -> a = b
n: nat

fact n = mprod_an 1 n

bezout_rel_prime_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q /\ a <= q /\ b <= p}}
binomial_spec : forall n p : nat, p <= n -> fact n = binomial n p * fact p * fact (n - p)
binomial_thm : forall n p : nat, p <= n -> fact n = binomial n p * fact p * fact (n - p)
BinNatDef.N.div_eucl = fun a b : BinNums.N => match a with | BinNums.N0 => (BinNums.N0, BinNums.N0) | BinNums.Npos na => match b with | BinNums.N0 => (BinNums.N0, a) | BinNums.Npos _ => BinNatDef.N.pos_div_eucl na b end end : BinNums.N -> BinNums.N -> BinNums.N * BinNums.N Arguments BinNatDef.N.div_eucl (_ _)%N_scope
Newton_nat : forall a b n : nat, expo n (a + b) = msum add 0 (S n) (fun i : nat => binomial n i * expo (n - i) a * expo i b)
fact_S : forall n : nat, fact (S n) = S n * fact n
bezout_generalized_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> {a : nat & {b : nat & {g : nat & {l : nat & {u : nat & {v : nat | a * p + b * q = g + l /\ is_gcd p q g /\ is_lcm p q l /\ p = u * g /\ q = v * g /\ a <= v /\ b <= u}}}}}}
fact_0 = eq_refl : fact 0 = 1
mscal_plus : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (a b : nat) (x : X), mscal m u (a + b) x = m (mscal m u a x) (mscal m u b x)
binomial_Newton : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x y : X, sum x y = sum y x) -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : X), times a b = times b a -> mscal times one n (sum a b) = msum sum zero (S n) (fun i : nat => mscal sum zero (binomial n i) (times (mscal times one (n - i) a) (mscal times one i b)))

```coq
unfold fact.
rewrite <- (fact_S n).
rewrite binomial_spec.
rewrite mprod_an_simpl.
rewrite mprod_an_simpl.
reflexivity.
Qed.```
